channel.title: skill development on mpostument.com
channel.description: Recent content in skill development on mpostument.com

item.title: Cultivating Creativity: Unveiling My Odyssey Through Drawing Foundations 2
item.description: Embark on an artistic odyssey as I recount my experience with the challenging Drawing Foundations 2 course. Join me in exploring the highs and lows of my creative journey, from mastering gesture drawings to delving into the intricate play of light and shadow. Witness the evolution of my artistry and the relentless pursuit of improvement with each stroke of the pencil.

item.title: Exploring the Art of Observation: Journey through the 'Fundamentals of Observational Drawing'
item.description: Join me on an artistic journey as I delve into the captivating world of observational drawing through the 'Fundamentals of Observational Drawing' course at New Master Academy. Discover the challenges, insights, and progress made as I explore fundamental techniques, deepen my understanding of light and shadow, tackle still life compositions, and even venture into the intricacies of drawing the human head. This transformative experience not only reinforces the foundations but also opens up new avenues for artistic expression. Don't miss out on this captivating exploration of observation in art.
